column1: Digital and Technology Solutions Specialist (Data Analytics) MSc
column3: School of Electronic Engineering and Computer Science
column5: Introducing you to specialist and strategic knowledge - with a strong focus on data analytics - this programme will enhance your understanding of key issues in business, technology, project and people management and allow you to consider these issues within the context of your workplace. You’ll combine academic learning at masters level with on-the-job practical training to acquire the skills required by employers. The programme is the result of a partnership between Queen Mary University of London, the Institute of Coding, and employers.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
